channel.title: Making commands unusable in wild
channel.description:
I'm trying to make commands unusable in wild, can someone help also I tried search for a tut under search "making commands not usable in combat" And it said no results so yeah i'm here ;(
I want it to be either in wild\or in combat.

item.title: Making commands unusable in wild
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Add this method:

public void wilderness() { if (absX >= 2949 && absX <= 3400 && absY >= 3521 && absY <= 4462) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Now for your command.

[code] if (command.startsWith(“command”)) {
if (!wilderness()) {

    	/*Add Things here*/

      } else {
	sendMessage("You cannot use this command in the Wilderness!");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
